meanings.sent1: She burnishes the silverware until it shines brightly.
meanings.sent2: He burnishes his shoes every morning to keep them looking new.
meanings.sent3: The little girl burnishes her toy car to make it sparkle like a diamond.
meanings.sent4: The sun burnishes the waves, turning them into liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The artist burnishes the metal sculpture, revealing its intricate details.

meanings.definition: Improve or enhance (something) by making small changes or additions.
meanings.sent1: Adding fresh herbs burnishes the flavor of the soup.
meanings.sent2: She burnishes her presentation with colorful visuals to make it more engaging.
meanings.sent3: The comedian burnishes his jokes with witty punchlines for maximum laughter.
meanings.sent4: His kindness burnishes his reputation, making him well-liked by everyone.
meanings.sent5: The extra practice burnishes her skills, making her a top performer in the team.
